name: Simon Dupree
teaser: Improving social and environmental conditions through the use of technology is Simon's vision.
bio: Having studied and worked in natural resource management and data science he has determined work towards improving social and environmental conditions through the use of technology. Having recently graduated from Founders and Coders Simon is very eager to use his software development skills within Yalla.

name: Joe Friel
teaser: Joe is keen to develop technology in a responsible way that will help drive positive, sustainable change.
bio: Joe worked in media and digital advertising where he helped build the children’s radio station, Fun Kids, into a national award-winning brand and set up an influencer marketing division for one of the UK’s leading advertising agencies. Having spent most of his career working where technology and young people intersect, Joe is keen to develop technology in a responsible way that will help drive positive, sustainable change.

name: Michael Watts
bio: Text to go here all about what makes us super amazing and everything else that we do. Clicking the link below would then take it to an individual page that has our bio along with a carousel of our work.
